ing: 3 Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "The aroma of mashed potatoes will always remind me of dinner at grandma and grandpa's house!"
ins:
Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes. Drain.
Mash potatoes with milk, sour cream, salt, and pepper in the large pot.
